titles.title: Expressing gratitude and appreciation to the individuals and organizations that comprise the National Urban Search and Rescue System of the Federal Emergency Management Agency for their unyielding determination and work as first responders to victims of disasters and other incidents, including the victims of the recent earthquake in Haiti, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: Expresses: (1) appreciation to the individuals and organizations that comprise the National Urban Search and Rescue System of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) for their work as first responders to victims of disasters; and (2) support for FEMA, including its Urban Search and Rescue Task Forces, as it undertakes response and recovery efforts in connection with the January 12, 2010, earthquake in Haiti.
